text: @realDonaldTrump Are you believing #COVID19 is real? Not a HOAX that can be remedied by a flu shot or your malaria drug cocktail. Touting of YOUR testing efforts, when WE wish we should have been notified sooner, so we wouldn't have such large numbers to test. Ever think of that @realDonaldTrump

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
